subject: HELLO OSCAR...(ATM-2024)
body:
BANK FEDERAL RESERVE BOARD 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ADDRESS: 33 LIBERTY STREET,NEW YORK, N.Y 10045 USA. 
 
 NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM BANK FEDERAL RESERVE BOARD NEW YORK. 
 
 
 HELLO OSCAR WE ARE SORRY FOR THE LATE RESPONSE AND I WANT TO LET YOU KNOW THAT THE PROCESSING CHARGE AND STAMP WILL COST YOU $850 TO AVOID ANY IMMEDIATE STOP ORDER FROM THE UNITED NATION OFFICE. NOTE THAT BECAUSE OF IMPOSTORS, WE HEREBY ISSUED YOU OUR CODE OF CONDUCT, WHICH IS (ATM-2024) SO YOU HAVE TO INDICATE THIS CODE WHEN REPLYING BACK TO US BY USING IT AS YOUR SUBJECT, WE GIVE YOU THIS CODE DUE TO SCAMMERS OKAY. , 
 
I WANT TO INFORM YOU THAT THE PAPER WORK OF YOUR CARD WILL COME WITH THE DELIVERY AGENT TOGETHER WITH YOUR ATM CARD AND ALSO THE PIN CODE OF YOUR CARD. WE HAVE ACTIVATED THE CARD SO THAT YOU CAN WITHDRAW MONEY WITH THE CARD AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THE CARD, SO I WILL ADVICE YOU TO GO AHEAD AND GIVE US YOUR DETAILS. 
 
BE REST ASSURED THAT NO OTHER FEE WILL BE REQUIRED FROM YOU, AND ONCE YOU SEND THE $850 DOLLARS TODAY YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR ATM CARD IN GOOD CONDITION, MY WORK HERE IS TO PROTECT YOU UNTIL YOUR ATM CARD GETS TO YOU AND ONCE YOUR ATM CARD MOVE OUT I WILL SEND YOU A TRACKING NUMBER OF YOUR PARCEL TO ENABLE YOU TRACK IT AND KNOW THEIR DESTINATION AND WHEN THEY WILL ARRIVE IN YOUR HOUSE, I PROMISE TO MAKE SURE YOU GET YOUR ATM CARD ALL I NEED FROM YOU RIGHT NOW IS YOUR CORPORATION AND I WILL ALWAYS KEEP MY WORD BECAUSE MY WORDS IS MY BOND. 
 
BELOW IS THE INFORMATION TO SEND THE PROCESSING CHARGE AND STAMPING FEE OF $850.00 VIA POSTAL MONEY ORDER. 
 
RECEIVER NAME: ANNELIE PALALAY KODAMA. 
ADDRESS: PO BOX 662219 LIHUE HAWAII 96766. USA. 
AMOUNT TO SEND $850.00 DOLLARS 
 
SENDERS NAME: 
SENDERS ADDRESS: 
 
LET ME HEAR FROM YOU WITH THE FULL POSTAL MONEY ORDER. PAYMENT SLIP AS SOON AS YOU MAKE THE PAYMENT TO THE BELOW INFORMATION. THANKS FOR BANKING WITH FEDERAL RESERVE BANK NEW YORK WHILE WE LOOKING FORWARD TO SERVING YOU BETTER. 
 
REGARD 
 
YOURS IN SERVICE, 
MR. JEROME H. POWELL (CHAIRMAN) 
FEDERAL RESERVE BANK NEW YORK
UNITED STATE OF AMERICA 
 
 
 
 Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2024 at 6:27 AM From: "Oscar" <yw91779@***.com> To: federalreservebank@iname.com Subject: Re: FEDERAL RESERVE BANK OF NEW 
 
Hello Mr. Jerome H. Powell, 
Thank you for reaching out to me and informing me about this exciting opportunity. I am thrilled to hear that the Federal Reserve Board New York Branch has concluded a meeting regarding my overdue contract payment. 
I understand that an ATM Master Card will be delivered to my home address, which is quite convenient for me. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. 
Firstly, could you please provide more details about the processing charge and stamp fee? How much would it cost exactly? 
Secondly, you mentioned a STOP ORDER from the United Nations office. Could you elaborate on what circumstances might lead to such an order? 
Lastly, could you explain more about the Code of Conduct ATM? Is it something I need to remember or use frequently? 
Looking forward to your response.
Best wishes, 
Oscar
